meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a utopia.
meanings.sent1: The utopian society in the story had no crime or poverty.
meanings.sent2: She had a utopian vision of a world where everyone lived in harmony.
meanings.sent3: In the utopian land of Candyland, the rivers were made of chocolate.
meanings.sent4: Her idea of a utopian paradise was a place where time stood still.
meanings.sent5: The utopian dream of everlasting peace seemed almost too good to be true.

meanings.definition: Idealistic or visionary, usually used to describe a perfect society or world.
meanings.sent1: The utopian novel painted a picture of a flawless future.
meanings.sent2: His utopian ideals inspired many to strive for a better world.
meanings.sent3: The utopian plan to have robots do all the chores backfired when they rebelled.
meanings.sent4: Her utopian goals reached for the stars, aiming for perfection.
meanings.sent5: The utopian society he imagined was a place where all problems had solutions.
